alert.note: Alert for Webb (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Corpus Christi (Corpus Cristi, Victoria and Laredo)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 30 at 3:38PM CDT by NWS Corpus Christi
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of south central Webb County through 415 PM CDT... At 337 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 11 miles southeast of Rio Bravo, or 19 miles southeast of Laredo, moving north at 15 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. This storm will remain over mainly rural areas of south central Webb County. This includes US Highway 83 between mile markers 732 and 734. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
